column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Great pizza... but personally I think it's overrated. It takes 30 mins to make a pizza
column2: so order an app while you wait. Their salad dressing is very good. I loved my spinach basil anchovy thin crust pizza. That's because I don't eat red meat or pork. So the special didn't do it for me. Anyway
column3: my pizza was delicious. Just don't think it's worth all the hype. Be prepared for the wait.
